text: Petra Platen (born 7 November 1959) is a German handball player who played for the West German national team. She was born in Moers. She represented West Germany at the 1984 Summer Olympics in Los Angeles, where the West German team placed fourth. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1959 births Category:Living people Category:Sportspeople from North Rhine-Westphalia Category:German female handball players Category:Olympic handball players of West Germany Category:Handball players at the 1984 Summer Olympics
title: Petra Platen
